You need to insert an SD card before using the camera.
No information was found for this website.
This website has been identified as a malware site. Malware infects your computer and can include viruses, worms, spyware and trojan horses.
This website has been identified as a phishing site. Phishing sites trick you into revealing your personal information such as passwords and bank account numbers.
This website has been identified as a spam site. Spamming sites capture your email address so they can send you unwanted advertisements by email.
Es wurden keine Informationen für diese Webseite gefunden.
Es wurde festgestellt, dass es sich bei dieser Webseite um eine Malware-Webseite handelt. Malware verseucht Ihren Rechner und kann Viren, Würmer, Spyware und trojanische Pferde enthalten.

Es wurde festgestellt, dass es sich bei dieser Webseite um eine Phishing-Webseite handelt. Phishing-Webseiten versuchen, Sie durch Täuschung dazu zu verleiten, persönliche Informationen wie Kennwörter und Kontonummern preiszugeben.
Es wurde festgestellt, dass es sich bei dieser Webseite um eine Spam-Webseite handelt. Spam-Webseiten erfassen Ihre Email-Adresse, um unerwünschte Werbe-Emails an Sie zu versenden.
No se ha encontrado información sobre este sitio web.
Este sitio web contiene malware. El malware infecta su equipo y puede incluir virus, gusanos, spyware y troyanos.
Este es un sitio web de phishing. Los sitios web de phishing intentan obtener información personal como contraseñas y datos bancarios de forma fraudulenta.
Este sitio web se ha identificado como spam. Los sitios web de spam capturan su dirección de correo electrónico para enviarle información no deseada por correo electrónico.
"Pas d'informations trouvées pour ce site Internet."

Ce site Internet a été identifié comme site diffusant des logiciels malveillants. Les logiciels malveillants contaminent votre ordinateur et peuvent comporter des virus, vers, logiciels espions et chevaux de Troie.
"Ce site Internet a été identifié comme site d'hameçonnage. Les sites d'hameçonnage vous incitent à révéler vos informations personnelles telles que des mots de passe et coordonnées bancaires."
Ce site Internet a été identifié comme site diffusant du spam. Les sites de spam capturent votre adresse électronique pour pouvoir vous envoyer des publicités indésirables par e-mail.
Impossibile trovare informazioni per questo sito web.
Il sito web è stato identificato come un sito di malware. Il malware infetta il computer e può contenere virus, worm, spyware e trojan horse.
"Il sito web è stato identificato come un sito di phishing. I siti di phishing ingannano l'utente portandolo a rivelare le informazioni personali come le password e i numeri del conto bancario."
"Il sito web è stato identificato come un sito di spam. I siti di spamming acquisiscono l'indirizzo email dell'utente in modo da poter inviare materiale pubblicitario non richiesto."
Não existem informações sobre este site da Web.
Este site da Web foi identificado como um site de malware. Malware infecta o seu computador e pode incluir vírus, worms, spyware e cavalos de Tróia.
Este site da Web foi identificado como um site de phishing. Os sites de phishing induzem o usuário a revelar suas informações pessoais, como senhas e números de contas bancárias.
Este site da Web foi identificado como um site de spam. Os sites de spam capturam o seu endereço de e-mail para enviar publicidade não solicitada por e-mail.

Activating Device Administrator allows you to delete private data from your device if it is lost or stolen. To delete private data, you are required to authorize the Erase all data operation. Avira Antivirus Security will only erase data on your request.

"To uninstall Avira Antivirus Security, two steps should be performed: 1) uninstall the application from your device. 2) delete the device from your Avira Android Web Console account.
Deactivate device administrator on the device beforehand.
Tap \"Go to uninstallation\" to continue."
To uninstall Avira Antivirus Security, Device Administrator must be turned off.
Tap the button below to deactivate Device Administrator.
Caution: The Wipe option \"Factory Reset\" cannot be triggered if Device Administrator is deactivated.

"Tap \"Continue\" to uninstall Avira Antivirus Security.
Tap \"Cancel\" if you want to continue using Avira Antivirus Security."

"The Wipe option \"Factory Reset\" cannot be triggered if Device Administrator is deactivated.

This file has been found to contain %s. We recommend that you remove this app immediately.
frameworks or behaviours that we classify as unwanted
These applications or files contain viruses or other malware that pose a direct threat to your personal data and/or device security. We recommend that you remove them immediately.

These applications are, or contain, components that are potentially undesirable for users. These may include apps that cause security issues; undesired, recurring or hidden costs; or tools that show other unwanted behavior.

Contains at least one mobile advertising framework that meets adware criteria, such as unexpected behaviour without clear user consent, unusual collection of personal data, annoying advertisement methods or excessively displaying adverts.
